document.full_text: after making a name for himself playing fictional mobster michael corleone in the blockbuster film trilogy "the godfather," actor al pacino will now be portraying a real one.
document.title: al pacino joins "gotti" film as mobster dellacroce
lines_and_colors: after making a name for himself playing fictional mobster michael corleone in the blockbuster film trilogy "the godfather," actor al pacino will now be portraying a real one.
